name: TNT! (itch) (Blequizinho)
description:
Most things are temporary, some sprites are a little ugly due to my development alone.
Menu screen, 6 characters, result screen,  one map, 5 power ups, character selection and  a demo of a story mode.

Controls
Player 1       W A S D R G

Player 2       Arrows rightCtrl rightShift

Player 3       Numpads 1 2 3 5 0 Enter

Player 4       L J K I ~ P
